item.description: Update Traffic Collision; INC#1033; 04:10PM; 369 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/32IyVLO; #BeverlyGrove; Man attempting to parallel park vehicle near (unidentified) restaurant drove his vehicle onto curb, allegedly striking (grazing?) two pedestrians, who were examined and released at scene. Contrary to the preliminary report (from 9-1-1 callers), the vehicle did NOT strike the building or enter any business. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #2187); FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E261 RA61 RA861 T61; CH4; 10; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1037; 03:47PM; 222 E 5th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mKcyN4; Downtown; 33 LAFD Firefighters took just 15 minutes (4:02 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one (yet unidentified) unit in a row of one story businesses. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E2 E209 E210 E9 RA209 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1033; 03:44PM; 369 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/32IyVLO; Beverly Grove; Address Tentative. PRELIM: One vehicle into (unidentified) restaurant. Undetermined yet if injuries. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #2187); FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E261 RA861 T61; CH4; 10; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1013; 03:47PM; 1448 W 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xg5hZJ; #Westlake; 35 LAFD firefighters took just 15 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a well-involved 2nd floor unit at a 7,680 square-foot, 20 unit, 2 story center-hallway apartment building. Several building occupants were shepherded to safety by firefighters as their colleagues aggressively battled flames. One civilian (unknown age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances ) is now being medically evaluated at scene by LAFD Paramedics. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E203 E211 E3 EM1 RA20 RA209 RA803 SQ21 T11 T3; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1013; 03:32PM; 1448 W 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xg5hZJ; #Westlake; PRELIM: Fire in one 2nd floor unit at a 2 story center hallway apartment building.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E11 E203 E211 E3 SQ21 T11 T3; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 12/27/2021 INC#1489

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1489; 08:30PM; NB 5 Fwy south of Grande Vista Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FG7kcY; #BoyleHeights; The driver ( unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances ), the sole occupant of the overturned 18-wheeler (unknown cargo) was quickly freed from the vehicle, and has been transported to an area hospital in undetermined condition. An LAFD Heavy Rescue unit is working with CHP/Caltrans officials to move the vehicle from lanes of travel. Media Inquiries: CHP Central L.A. (Log #2443); FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E202 E25 EM1 HR3 RA1 RA17 RA25 T2; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1489; 07:54PM; NB 5 Fwy south of Grande Vista Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FG7kcY; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Overturned 18-wheeler (unknown cargo), with 1 person trapped.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; E202 E25 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA25 T2; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1194; 06:14PM; 823 N Orange Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sBrroD; Fairfax; KNOCKDOWN: 19 firefighters located a contents fire in the unit and extinguished it in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. No other units were damaged. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 RA41 T27 T61; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1194; 05:53PM; 823 N Orange Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sBrroD; Fairfax; Two story duplex with fire in one unit (initial reports of fire on the 2nd floor but possibly extending to the 1st). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0576; 10:43AM; 426 N Neptune Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JlH3CC; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire partially extended into the attic but was prevented from damaging an exposed storage shed. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E238 E248 E264 E40 E48 E64 T38 T48 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
